attributes.action: not provide, but allow funding for single vaccines for mmr to families
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i chose not to give my 2year old MMR and will do the same for its booster and for all my other children when the time comes as i have seen adverse reactions and developmental regression commencing immediately after the vaccine and believe the two are closely connected.
i call for the government if it will not give single vaccines on the NHS, to at least offer a percentage of funding so that low income families like ours can afford seperate vaccines for our children, even though it should be the right of all to choose. i want to protect my children in what I BELIEVE is the safer way but i cant afford it so am left with the choice of the risks of the diseases, the risks of the triple vaccine which i have seen firsthand, or getting into debt, and no country should allow this to happen to its people in a modern world.
